languages.text: {n}Глаза дознавателя, кажется, остекленели: он не видит вас, не видит фигуры на доске — его взгляд направлен в вечность. Руки и лицо Хейнрикса, кажется, заморожены — словно сама влага в его теле превратилась в лед.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза дознавателя, кажется, остекленели: он не видит вас, не видит фигуры на доске — его взгляд направлен в вечность. Руки и лицо Хейнрикса, кажется, заморожены — словно сама влага в его теле превратилась в лед.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The Interrogator's eyes have turned glassy, blind to you and the pieces on the board — he is staring into eternity instead. His hands and face are frozen, as though the moisture in his body has turned to ice.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза дознавателя, кажется, остекленели: он не видит вас, не видит фигуры на доске — его взгляд направлен в вечность. Руки и лицо Хейнрикса, кажется, заморожены — словно сама влага в его теле превратилась в лед.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyes have turned glassy, blind to you and the pieces on the board — he is staring into eternity instead. His hands and face are frozen, as though the moisture in his body has turned to ice.{/n}

{n}The Interrogator's eyes have turned glassy, blind to you and the pieces on the board — he is staring into eternity instead. His hands and face are frozen, as though the moisture in his body has turned to ice.{/n}

{n}The Interrogator's eyes have turned glassy, blind to you and the pieces on the board — he is staring into eternity instead. His hands and face are frozen, as though the moisture in his body has turned to ice.{/n}

{n}The Interrogator's eyes have turned glassy, blind to you and the pieces on the board — he is staring into eternity instead. His hands and face are frozen, as though the moisture in his body has turned to ice.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希的眼神变得呆滞，看不到你，也看不到棋盘上的棋子，仿佛在凝视着永恒的虚空。他的双手和脸都已经冻僵了，身体里的水分也仿佛全都冻成了冰。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyes have turned glassy, blind to you and the pieces on the board — he is staring into eternity instead. His hands and face are frozen, as though the moisture in his body has turned to ice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希的眼神变得呆滞，看不到你，也看不到棋盘上的棋子，仿佛在凝视着永恒的虚空。他的双手和脸都已经冻僵了，身体里的水分也仿佛全都冻成了冰。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los ojos del interrogador son vidriosos y no os ve ni a ti ni a las piezas del tablero. Mira a la eternidad. Sus manos y su cara están heladas, como si toda la humedad en su cuerpo se hubiera convertido en hielo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyes have turned glassy, blind to you and the pieces on the board — he is staring into eternity instead. His hands and face are frozen, as though the moisture in his body has turned to ice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos del interrogador son vidriosos y no os ve ni a ti ni a las piezas del tablero. Mira a la eternidad. Sus manos y su cara están heladas, como si toda la humedad en su cuerpo se hubiera convertido en hielo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターは虚ろな眼差しで、あなたや盤上の駒が見つめていた…永遠を見つめているかのようだった。その手も顔も凍りつき、まるで体内の水分が氷に変わったかのようだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyes have turned glassy, blind to you and the pieces on the board — he is staring into eternity instead. His hands and face are frozen, as though the moisture in his body has turned to ice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターは虚ろな眼差しで、あなたや盤上の駒が見つめていた…永遠を見つめているかのようだった。その手も顔も凍りつき、まるで体内の水分が氷に変わったかのようだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les yeux vitreux, il ne semble plus rien voir de ce qui l'entoure ; ni vous ni les pièces sur le plateau. Son regard est perdu dans l'éternité. Ses mains et son visage sont complètement gelés, comme si toute l'humidité contenue dans son corps s'était changée en glace.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyes have turned glassy, blind to you and the pieces on the board — he is staring into eternity instead. His hands and face are frozen, as though the moisture in his body has turned to ice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux vitreux, il ne semble plus rien voir de ce qui l'entoure ; ni vous ni les pièces sur le plateau. Son regard est perdu dans l'éternité. Ses mains et son visage sont complètement gelés, comme si toute l'humidité contenue dans son corps s'était changée en glace.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Augen des Interrogators wirken glasig, blicken weder auf dich noch auf die Figuren auf dem Brett – stattdessen starrt er ins Leere. Seine Hände und sein Gesicht wirken eingefroren, als ob jegliche Körperflüssigkeit zu Eis erstarrt wäre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyes have turned glassy, blind to you and the pieces on the board — he is staring into eternity instead. His hands and face are frozen, as though the moisture in his body has turned to ice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen des Interrogators wirken glasig, blicken weder auf dich noch auf die Figuren auf dem Brett – stattdessen starrt er ins Leere. Seine Hände und sein Gesicht wirken eingefroren, als ob jegliche Körperflüssigkeit zu Eis erstarrt wäre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu'nun gözleri donuklaşıyor. Ne senin ne de oyun tahtasındaki taşların farkına varıyor. Bunun yerine ebediyete gözlerini dikiyor. Elleri ve yüzü, bedenindeki tüm nem buza dönmüşçesine donmuş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyes have turned glassy, blind to you and the pieces on the board — he is staring into eternity instead. His hands and face are frozen, as though the moisture in his body has turned to ice.{/n}
